What's Your Favourite Celebration in a Fighting Game?

Selling Forum   1994, 1997 and 1999 were all particularly good years so I can understand why people chose them. Kaiser Knuckle (and Dan-Ku-Ga) was another outstanding fighter from '94. One year no-one mentioned yet is 1995 which I'd consider the second best after 1996. Dragoon Might Kabuki Klash Oni The Ninja Master Real Bout Fatal Fury Samurai Shodown 3 Savage Reign Street Fighter Alpha Vampire Hunter World
